[[inst_lbui]]
==== LBUI

*Syntax:* lbui [SrcL, simm], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Load 8-bit unsigned byte from memory at effective address.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_lbui.svg[LBUI encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/BASE_IMM
